name: Fuzzbomb's Github stuff.
body:
## Slideshows
- [Introduction to Web Accessibility](http://fuzzbomb.github.io/a11y-intro-slides)
  Slides from a guest lecture I gave to students at the University of Bradford (March 2016)
- [Web Accessibility for Javascript Developers](http://fuzzbomb.github.io/js-a11y-intro-slideshow/)
  Slides from a talk I gave to LeedsJS (Jaunary 2016)

## Code Demos
- [Accessible mobile menu demo](http://fuzzbomb.github.io/mobile-menu-a11y-demo/)
  Demo of a "burger" menu button that works well for keyboard-only and screen-reader users.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
